reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress elegant with excellent quality and silhouette, and appreciate its soft velvet material and lush color. The dress fits well, with one customer noting it falls mid-calf, and they find it comfortable and flattering. They like its versatility, with one mentioning it's perfect for ballet, and another noting it's great for Christmas parties.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase. Beautiful dress.
items.body: Very pretty. Nice material, and stretchy so is comfortable. Dark green is gorgeous, I’m 5’4” and 150lbs, and the size Large fits perfectly. True to size. Worth the purchase. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy, warm & stylish.
items.body: This dress drapes beautifully. The fabric is soft, flowy and flattering. With the slight stretch, it's body hugging yet forgiving. The lines are cut in a very flattering way & the back zip assures easy on/off & great fit. The seams are well sewn, and quality of fabric feels luxurious & just fight thickness for velour. Wore it the first time for an afternoon Christmas party at a fancy golf club & I sure fit in with the ritzy crowd! I trusted the sizing & this hits the mark. I'm 5'6", 135#, 34D bust. Took it out of the bag the night before & hung it in the bathroom to allow the wrinkles to fall out, that's all it needed. Read more
items.author: Mrs. Anne J. Lawson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Elegant
items.body: It fits right and is light for velvet. Looks celebratory. Read more
items.author: Shree

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Fabric and Fit!!
items.body: Absolutely gorgeous, I was so nervous to order this dress, as I'm pretty busy,.... I would normally take a xl, but, I followed the size guide, and ordered ann xxl. Absolutely perfect fit, it is like it was designed for me!! Sleeves usually are too long, but, they're perfect. I'll be wearing it for a Western Christmas Theme Party, that I was hired to teach LineDance to. **I'm pairing the Deep Wine color dress with Black Cowboy Boots, Black Cowboy Hat, and Silver Choncho Chain Belt (Amazon). I'll post a picture when I do the Party!! Can't wait! Read more
items.author: Lorna D.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress; looks expensive
items.body: Wore this for a Fiona cosplay. Got a ton of compliments. This dress is extremely flattering and comfortable. The emerald green velvet is exactly as pictured and vibrant. Fabric is opaque, so you don't need to wear a slip or underskirt unless you want to. It is a little big on me at the waist, so I made a basque-style removable belt for it out of gold lace ribbon. The fabric is also polyester, so I also wore it with a cotton underlayer and underarm pads because I have hyperhidrosis in my armpits, and synthetic fabrics seem to cause bad smells. This dress is something you can wear for many occasions; it'd be great for Christmas parties or having family photos taken. The quality and silhouette is excellent. It looks like something you'd purchase from an upscale department store, not Amazon. Read more
items.author: Court

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Needs a belt
items.body: The top part of the dress fits great but then it's full and really would look better with the right belt. It's very pretty but I returned. Read more
items.author: Pam

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, elegant dress!
items.body: I got tons of compliments on this dress! Great fit (I got one size smaller than recommended based on other reviews), super comfy and soft, and looks very elegant. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and elegant
items.body: Wore this comfortable dress to a winter wedding with a gold scarf draped over my shoulders. Great fit and looked elegant. Stayed wrinkle free. Read more
items.author: Moving

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Evening Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Evening Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Darkgreen, Navy, Burgundy, Black, Darkred. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
